mdRecord.dcterms:title: The 20th Century Song Book
mdRecord.dcterms:description: A pamphlet using popular 20th Century Songs such as "Auld Lang Syne" and "Star Spangled Banner" to accompany testimonials and advertisements for Wine of Cardeu and Thedford's Black Draught Liver Medicine. This pamphlet was distributed in Floyd Country by Howard & Huff, Dealers in Dry Goods, Groceries, Hardware, Medicines, Hats, Caps, Boots, Shoes and Ready-Made Clothing.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Advertising
Folk songs
Medicine
mdRecord.dcterms:provenance: Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University. University Libraries
